org.apache.ignite.internal.binary

Class BinaryWriterExImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.binary.BinaryWriterExImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataOutput, ObjectOutput, AutoCloseable, org.apache.ignite.binary.BinaryRawWriter, org.apache.ignite.binary.BinaryWriter, org.apache.ignite.internal.binary.BinaryRawWriterEx
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryWriterExImplNew

    public class BinaryWriterExImpl
extends Object
implements org.apache.ignite.binary.BinaryWriter, org.apache.ignite.internal.binary.BinaryRawWriterEx, ObjectOutput
    Binary writer implementation.

        public void writeFieldIdNoSchemaUpdate(int fieldId)
